name: io.bytes.per.checksum
description:
The number of bytes per checksum.  Must not be larger than
  io.file.buffer.size.

name: yarn.app.mapreduce.shuffle.log.limit.kb
description:
Maximum size of the syslog.shuffle file in kilobytes
    (0 for no limit).

name: dfs.namenode.blockreport.queue.size
description: The queue size of BlockReportProcessingThread in BlockManager.

name: mapreduce.task.io.sort.mb
description:
The total amount of buffer memory to use while sorting
  files, in megabytes.  By default, gives each merge stream 1MB, which
  should minimize seeks.

name: mapreduce.job.running.map.limit
description:
The maximum number of simultaneous map tasks per job.
  There is no limit if this value is 0 or negative.

name: dfs.namenode.decommission.backoff.monitor.pending.blocks.per.lock
description:
When loading blocks into the replication queue, release the namenode write
    lock after the defined number of blocks have been processed.
